scripts.clean: rm -rf css && npm run clean:dev && npm run clean:dist
scripts.copy:dev: mkdir dev && cp index.html dev/ && cp -rf img dev/ && cp -rf fonts dev/ && mkdir dev/css && mkdir dev/js
scripts.copy:dist: mkdir dist && cp index.html dist/ && cp robots.txt dist/ && cp -rf img dist/ && cp -rf fonts dist/ && mkdir dist/css && mkdir dist/js
scripts.concat-js:dev: uglifyjs js/jquery-1.11.2.min.js js/modernizr.custom.js js/polyfill.js js/draggabilly.pkgd.min.js js/elastiStack.js js/precentLoader.js js/scrollStyler.js js/jquery-ui.min.js js/jquery.dlmenu.js js/fotorama.js js/owl.carousel.js js/responsiveslides.js js/retina.js js/jquery-mousewheel.js js/main.js --mangle -o dev/js/main.js
scripts.concat-js:dist: uglifyjs js/jquery-1.11.2.min.js js/modernizr.custom.js js/polyfill.js js/draggabilly.pkgd.min.js js/elastiStack.js js/precentLoader.js js/scrollStyler.js js/jquery-ui.min.js js/jquery.dlmenu.js js/fotorama.js js/owl.carousel.js js/responsiveslides.js js/retina.js js/jquery-mousewheel.js js/main.js --mangle -o dist/js/main.js
scripts.concurrent:dev: concurrent "npm run sass:dev" "npm run watch:css" "npm run watch:js" "npm run watch:html" "npm run liveserver"
scripts.serve: npm run clean:dev && npm run copy:dev && npm run sass && npm run concat-css:dev && npm run concat-js:dev && npm run concurrent:dev
scripts.build: npm run clean:dist && npm run copy:dist && npm run sass && npm run concat-css:dist && npm run concat-js:dist && npm run purifycss
